headline: Citi Highlights Weakening Polyethylene Market, Trims DOW Price Target
summary: Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On November 19, Citi reduced the firm’s price target on Dow Inc. (NYSE:DOW) to $23 from $25 and maintained a Neutral rating on the shares. The firm also lowered its estimates for other chemical companies due to price discounting in […]
